title: Ticket #5407: need test for condor_q -format and -autoformat
description:
need a test that checks for correct operation of 

    condor_q -format

and 

    condor_q -af

This test should generate a file containing a set of classads with known attributes and values, and then it will run 

   condor_q -jobads <file> -format ...

and check that the return value and output of condor_q matches what is expected.

Things to check. 

  condor_q -af
  condor_q -af:,
  condor_q -af:h
  condor_q -af:ln
  condor_q -af:lrng


  condor_q -format "%s"
  condor_q -format "%d"
  condor_q -format "%v"
check_ins: 2016-Jul-15 12:15   Check-in [48793]: Added test for condor_q -format and -af. Ticket #5407 (By shuyang )
creator: johnkn
